active_transactions_count: you have %{smart_count} ongoing transaction |||| you have %{smart_count} ongoing transactions
activity_summary_meta: Your activity summaries are sent every %{periodicity} days. You can change this periodicity or even disable those emails in your email notifications settings. If there is anything you would like to see appear in those activity summaries, you can send your suggestions by replying to this email
did_you_know_1: If your friends aren't on inventaire.io yet, you can invite them by email to start sharing your books inventories!
did_you_know_2:
There are two different text fields on each of your books' page:
- in details, anything you write will be visible by anyone who can see the book.
- in private notes, everything you write will be visible just by you, whatever the book's visibility settings are
did_you_know_3: You can contribute to the future of inventaire.io by voting for the next features!
did_you_know_4: Using a pseudo is perfectly fine on inventaire.io, but if you want people to find you or if you want to invite other users to connect as friends, make sure you have a profile picture or some presentation text that they can recognize
did_you_know_5: You can search Inventaire from your browser search bar
email_confirmation_paragraph: Proszę kliknąć na link, żebyśmy mogli w przyszłości użyć twojego adresu email z całkowitą pewnością, że rzeczywiście należy do ciebie (chociażby żeby pomóc ci zresetować hasło).
email_confirmation_subject: Witaj na stronie Inventaire.io!! Oto link potwierdzający twój adres email
email_confirmation_title: Dziękuję ci %{username} za dołączenie do Inventaire!
email_invitation_button: Zarejestruj się i zacznij dzielić książkami z %{username}
email_invitation_intro: Inventaire is a web application that lets you share the inventory of your books with your friends and communities
email_invitation_learn_more: Inventaire is a project standing up for better information on resources, which for us means powered by open knowledge and libre software: learn more on inventaire.io
email_invitation_subject: %{username} zaprosił cię do udostępnienia swoich książek na Inventaire.io!
email_invitation_user_inventory: You can already see %{username}'s public books here but you need an account to have access to all the books %{username} wants to share with you.
friendship_request_button: go to %{username}'s inventory to accept the invitation
friendship_request_subject: %{username} zaprasza cię do połączenia waszych inwentarzy!
group_acceptRequest_subject: [%{groupName}] twoja prośba o dołączenie do grupy została zweryfikowana!
group_email_invitation_button: Sign up and start sharing books with the members of %{groupName}
group_email_invitation_subject: %{username} invited you to join the group %{groupName} on Inventaire.io!
group_invitation_inventory: You can already see the books %{groupName} members share publicly here, but you need an account to have access to all the books the group has to share.
group_invite_button: wejdź na stronę grupy by zaakceptować lub odrzucić zaproszenie
last_nearby_books: new books in nearby people inventories
last_network_books: new books in your friends' and groups' inventories
news_4:
The new Inventaire interface is here! You can now browse inventories by authors, genres, or subjects. We also introduced a new display to browse inventories in a more compact way: look for the Display mode button, and select Table. This Table mode also allows you to change the visibility or the transaction mode of many of your books at once, which used to be a painful operation.
More to come!
pending_friends_requests_count: you have %{smart_count} pending friend request |||| you have %{smart_count} pending friend requests
pending_group_invitations_count: you have %{smart_count} pending group invitation |||| you have %{smart_count} pending group invitations
pending_group_requests_count: there is %{smart_count} request to join a group waiting for your approval |||| there are %{smart_count} requests to join a group waiting for your approval
reset_password_paragraph:
Otrzymaliśmy prośbę o zresetowania hasła dla twojego konta %{username}.
Jeśli to ty wysłałeś tą prośbę, kliknij na przycisk poniżej. Jeżeli to nie byłeś ty, możesz zignorować tego maila.
stop_email_invitations: Jeśli nie chcesz otrzymywać od nas emaili, wyślij wiadomość na adres stop-emails@inventaire.io
stop_email_notifications: zmień ustawienia maila. W razie problemów lub pytań, wyślij emaila na adres: help@inventaire.io
unread_notifications_count: you have %{smart_count} unread notification |||| you have %{smart_count} unread notifications
update_on_item_you_requested_subject: wieści od %{username} na temat %{title}
update_on_item_you_requested_title: Tytuł [%{title}] zaktualizowany na twoją prośbę od %{username}
update_on_your_item_subject: wieści od %{username} na temat twojej książki %{title}
you_are_welcome_to_reply: śmiało możesz odpowiedzieć na ten email w razie jakichkolwiek pytań lub sugestii
your_item_was_requested_subject: %{username} poprosił o twoją książkę %{title}
